smart_goals.description: Reduce daily carbohydrate intake to 45% of total caloric intake by the end of next month.
Increase physical activity to 150 minutes per week, spread throughout the week, starting from today.
Monitor and maintain an average daily blood sugar level below 150 mg/dL, as measured by self-monitoring, within the next three months.
Take prescribed medication as instructed, specifically 10mg Metformin twice daily, starting from tomorrow.
Achieve 7 hours or more of sleep per night, as measured by a sleep tracker, within the next month.
